item.title: Individual website portfolio: Project 1
item.description: Climate change and temperature anomalies If we wanted to study climate change, we can find data on the Combined Land-Surface Air and Sea-Surface Water Temperature Anomalies in the Northern Hemisphere at NASAâ€™s Goddard Institute for Space Studies. The tabular data of temperature anomalies can be found here To define temperature anomalies you need to have a reference, or base, period which NASA clearly states that it is the period between 1951-1980.
